title: Azir ult go through enemies Patch 4.19 [GAMEPLAY]
body:
Dear Riot, I main emperor of shurima {{champion:268}} , 
I understand this champ was a really risky champ to create because his mechanics are really hard to fit in on the summoners rift. During my first game of the 4.19 patch, I tought the Wall's bug was fixed (even though I used to only rarely encounter glitch with this champion, I was happy that you tryed to fix it) the thing is that now, his ult is even more laggy then it used to be.

Xin dash can go through my ult and I don't know if its because he's too eavy or something but my ult also go through volybear without touching him like if he was wearing a banshee (He wasn't wearing a banshee, I looked up). 

I can't explain in more detail how the lag occured, because its really simple, azir wall only push back anymore 1 time out of 3 or 4. 

Riot please fix this ! Thank you !


EDIT : 
I just played a new game with the emperor and I now know that {{champion:4}}  can't be touched by my ult. I don't know if it can help you fix the lag (Maybe this is some failure in the coding about some champion, I'm just guessing , the rest is up to you riot)

replies.body:
I played Azir almost every game since he was released and there is couple of bugs he has. Before this new patch minor bugs were:
1. When he dashes to his soldiers and enemy champion is on the way, sometimes (rarely) he would go through enemy (enemy didn't have Banshee or something like that).
2. If you enable to see range while quick cast spells, when you press and hold Q, you would see range-line for 1 or 2 sec after solider is gone.
3. If spell is on cooldown, I wouldn't show it that it is. It would look like his spell is ready again, but it's not.
Everything else work fine for me. And now, after this new patch (4.19), is ult is very bugged. Almost every time at least 1 can go through my ult and that makes hit ult almost useless. Please fix this as soon as possible.
I am also having a problem with his ult. almost all of the ults I used last game did no damage and didn't have the knockback, enemies were also able to walk through the wall.

Yeah he is definetly more bugged this patch. I created a soldier, moved it behind the enemy and when i pressed E it instantly deleted the soldier and i didn't dash. Also there was a bug on his q that if u use right after a soldier dies it still shows the indicator coming from the ground where the minion was. And yeah, played a game, out of 10 ults 8 didn't do anything. Just wish they could revert 4.19 changes with a hotfix because he is impossible to play in his current state.
Riven can also e through the wall.
I played Azir today in an ARAM and one time, Seju charged through my R animation and another time, Shaco did not get knocked away by my ult.
Also had this problem... 0 out of 4 affected enemies. Probably got reported for feeding because of it.
were his skills ...laggy... to you? last game I was having to press a button 2-4 times before a skill would trigger. I actually had no wall issues though.

The major lag I used to encounter with azir skills where before patch 4.19, sometime , I clicked on skills and they would work, but the image of the skill wouldn't go on cooldown phase, so I would think that I still had those skills able when in fact, they weren't. 

I didn't experience any lag of your kind in my first 4.19 game tho.
with any luck maybe it was just good old fashion lag...

No, I play Azir often, and that is a problem on every ability but w. You will use a cool down, and on the summoners screen it appears to still be up, but is in fact on CD. It is quite frustrating to try and set up for a q, to only realize its still down.

He also has a lagging issue with his auto attacks and soldiers. Lots of times after they charge, or are just summoned, they have a problem making the first attack. The animation will go through all the way, or mostly, but no damage will be done to the minion. Sometimes he will do the studder animation, and the damage will actually go through. 

It seems to me, that when a soldier is moved, summoned, or takes a break from attacking, then attacks, his soldiers basic attacks have a chance of not hitting, or a lagging animation that doesn't hit. It doesn't sound like this was addressed in the patch, that had quite a vague update on Azir.

> were his skills ...laggy... to you? last game I was having to press a button 2-4 times before a skill would trigger. I actually had no wall issues though.

Mine was as well. I was wondering why my Q wasn't registering fast enough or they would just not go where I clicked.

Yeah i just got done playing an game of azir in the mid lane against xerath. This happened to me as well, but another thing i've been see is the ulti will sometimes go through walls and champions. It doesn't shove them against the wall and catch them, 50% of the time it was just a waste of mana. (P-4.19)
Just happened to me alot in an intermediate bot game, my ult was worthless, kept going through Shyvanna Bot. Happened around 3 times in a row.

i just played Azir for the third game in a row. every time i ulted with him it would go right past the enemy champion i was aiming it at and nothing would happen. plz riot fix this i dont like having this ult if it cant do anything

I am having the same issue with the Ulti, just finished a game and Udyr walked through it twice, I thought it was just a bug between udyr and azir. However, later in the game two other people were not affected, and simply kept on walking as if the ulti hadn't been cast on them.... Makes his ulti useless.
I just had a whole game where ult does no dmage, no knock up and no blocking.......
Happening to me aswell
It would be great if we could at least get riot to acknowledge this to know if they will be planning to fix this with a hotfix or if Azir will stay dead for the entirety 0f 4.19

I can confirm this, I just played a game as Azir, and noticed I cast my ult perhaps 5 times. 3 of which did nothing when it hit the opponent, they literally walked right through it without any abilities or items that would allow them to do so. 

Rito, I sincerely hope you read this and work on a fix for Azir as I love the Emperor of Shurima, however without his Ult he is at a very major disadvantage.

Just played a ranked game with Azir. My ult was worthless. It worked once or twice out of the 6 or 7 times I was able to cast it. Definitely helped me lose the lane, and my ranked match. Hopefully you can fix this issue, or loss prevent some of the people that have lost due to having a bugged ultimate. Appreciate the work, Riot. Hope it all works out.

Yes, i have had the same problem. After Zed uses his ability death mark my wall passes right through him as if he were a friendly. Same with Yasuo and Hecarim. 
Also, even though this may be off topic, I cant seem to use Azir's E while walking or after casting w or q (unless its supposed to be that way).

**Thank you Riot** for putting up with Azir, even with all the fixes/patches and ushering in of the new summoner's rift.

I can confirm this from an opposing standpoint. I was playing aram a few hours ago as Cho gath and, although I took repeated ults to the face by an enemy Azir, I never once was moved in any way. Looking back I'm not sure I was even damaged by his ult.

I main Azir and I have also noticed this bug myself. I was playing dominion and when I ulted someone, just the soldiers would appear. No damage. No knockback. Just soldiers. This is no small issue. Riot, please fix this ASAP.

Same thing, Azir ult doesn't push back Fizz 1.5 - 3 seconds after Fizz has finished using trickster and has been on the ground for that time.  Pretty stupid, fix your game and get the QA department to actually thoroughly test the bugs and don't limit the scope of the testing to only the behavior that was reported.

I've been having this issue as well. While playing ranked 3's with a couple of friends, I was playing Azir, and Azir's ultimate, on more than one occasion, went right through the enemy Annie, without damaging or pushing her.

I just played the most frustrating game of my life, glad to see some vindication here.  5 out of 6 ults went completely through the enemies and was walk-through-able... and I had 2 bugsplats.  What the heck did riot do to azir!  his ult is totally broken now.

I came here to report this exact issue. Whatever you did to azirs ult made it more buggy than ever! 
Please revert the changes! This is ruining my ranked!
Lol yep, I main Azir and just made a thread about this. Made me lose lane against fizz
Game to forums to post this.  Happened against Sion twice in my last match.

I played two games as Azir with the new patch and my ult has "missed" 3 enemies now.  Two times they were just in front of me about to attack and another time a Leona was under tower with me and I used it and it just went over her but still locked her behind it.  Besides that its working as intended.

It's ridiculous how their supposed bug fix, which was aimed at small bugs which most people would be able to live with, caused more, bigger bugs that breaks the champion.

If they wanted to bug fix Azir they should've gone for those damn CD timer bugs or his soldier's AA's.
Those happen all the time and they're really annoying.




OnTopic:

Experienced the ult bug as well but not as often as the others have mentioned. 
Then again it never worked when I needed it to survive.
Also experienced the bugs where your spells go off with 1-2 seconds delay, even though every other command works without any delay whatsoever (hence not ping related). 
Didn't last very long though.
Just played a game where my ult had a 1/4 chance to actually knock back an enemy at all. It literally just went right through them most of the time. Definitely more buggy than before.

I figured out the cause of the problem. The ult fails when a soldier is in range of the enemy.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/pqlU46y1-gameplay-azir-ultimate-not-applying-the-knockback-in-patch-419
This happened in my first game with Azir as well. I think his ultimate was recognizing enemies as allies. My targets won't take any damage and won't be knocked back as well.
JUst played Azir and his ult only works 33% of the time. It will just go through champions for no reason, having no affect whatsoever.....

His ult is bugged so badly, {{champion:55}} was ulting, tried ulting her away and she stayed there and kept spinning. {{champion:91}} jumped on me, and I tried ulting him away but he just stayed right next to me. This is a very bugged champion, but he's so much fun at the same time.

I just played an Azir game and had the exact same problem.  My ult went through every single enemy without damaging or knocking them back.  Velkoz, Vi, Fiddlesticks, you name it. Pretty crippling bug, surprised that Riot hasn't disabled him until it's fixed.

Azir is my main champ I would use. The ult now does nothing for me or my teammates. Its useless during team fights. No one gets knocked back and no one gets damage at time. {{champion:268}} I understand that their were a few things to on the ult but just being a waste of mana isn't what we players had in mind. Hopefully the ult will be fixed and Azir can be lane crusher again.
I just had the same issue...  My ult is just going through people and not even doing damage either.. got me killed at least 3 times.
I just bought Azir right after the patch and I'm pretty damn peeved about this bullshit

Azir is kickass...when his ult works. Ult has been very buggy the last couple of days. Just played a game where only maybe 1/4 of the ultis knocked back and damaged/unpassable. Please fix our favorite champ.

I have had this issue a few times now. Once the wall is standing, it works as intended, but the animation will go right through enemies. 

Also, I've encountered a bug where the skillshot indicator will appear when I press Q, but the soldier will not move. I think the problem is that the soldier is despawning, but the Q indicator remains.

Yeah I was playing with an Azir last night and noticed his ultimate was incredibly buggy, it was going through enemies and was generally useless as a disengage ultimate. It was incredibly frustrating considering other team had a Warwick and he would ultimate into our Vayne, Azir tries to ult him off, nothing.

I just played ranked with him and did tryhard plays with flash ult and just waste my flash and beeing close to their turret. i wish that lose was pretended. the ult only knocked khazix back when he was in his jump and i countered but any staying target was not affected.
